description: My initial foray into the industry commenced with a formative internship at Anubhooti Solutions, an innovative AI-based startup. Here, I delved into the development of a transformative text-to-speech converter application for senior citizens and individuals with visual impairments.

The internship experience was enriching, filled with new challenges and learning opportunities. The impact of my work here still motivates me to sharpen my skills and make a positive difference in the world.
